LanguageData.PES_CombatFervor_Thought.stages.0.label: Combat Fervor
LanguageData.PES_CombatFervor_Thought.stages.0.descri: It is my honor to fight to the death for the freedom of the colony.
LanguageData.PES_CombatTiredness_Thought.stages.0.des: We could have avoided this combat, but now we may get injured from this, or even die. This is a meaningless fight.
